verse:
यो योनिं योनिमधितिष्ठत्येको यस्मिन्निदं सं च वि चैति सर्वम्‌।
तमीशानं वरदं देवमीड्यं निचाय्येमां शान्तिमत्यन्तमेति॥

terms.यो योनिं योनिमधितिष्ठति: The one who resides in every being,
terms.एको यस्मिन्निदं सं च विचैति सर्वम्‌: Yet remains singular, encompassing and pervading everything,
terms.तमीशानं वरदं देवमीड्यं निचाय्ये: That Supreme Lord, who is worthy of adoration and worship,
terms.मां शान्तिमत्यन्तमेति: May I attain eternal peace by surrendering to Him.

meaning: Meaning:This verse from the Brihadaranyaka Upanishad highlights the concept of the divine presence that exists within all beings. It emphasizes that the Supreme Lord, who exists in every living being and yet transcends all, is the ultimate object of worship and adoration. By surrendering to this divine force, one can attain ultimate peace and tranquility.
